column5: here's a sneak peek of the spring classic for BPS in Toronto.. they tried to hide this on their website, so there might still be changes  http://www.basspro.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/CFPageBasic?storeId=10151&catalogId=10001&langId=-1&appID=206&template=calendar.cfm&loc=24  I'm going to be getting one of the new carbonlites
